alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued October 06 at 3:17PM EDT until October 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Statement, isolated minor coastal flooding during high tide. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach and Coastal Broward Counties. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Statement, through Sunday evening. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property near the coast. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County
